verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w marriage|strong="G1062"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Cana|strong="G2580"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*.
